title: DAX Fridays! #42: SUBSTITUTE (multiple values)
excerpt: In today's video, we will learn how to use the DAX function SUBSTITUTE.  Substitute changes text for another text. We will do two examples, how to substitute one value for another and how to substitute multiple values.
